Wincci Z

Project Title

Crepe Me Up

Description

Crepe Me Up is an mobile app UI design work for online ordering crepe cakes. I adopted macaron color scheme since it is a symbol of sweetness.The color complements each other magnificently. I also did POP testing and wireframe design for this project.

I used Sketch for the User Interface Design part and created interactive mockup by InVision. UI Design and Style Guildlines are showcaseing here.

Technologies

Sketch, InVision

Role

UI Designer

Year

2019

Next

Weather Forecast
